title: THE NORTH FACE Base Camp Flip Flop Kids Sandals
features: FOOTWEAR FREEDOM. Inspired by our expedition equipment, the Youth Base Camp Flip Flop is a classic sandal with a cushioned footbed and comfortable, durable strap. It'll quickly become their favorite footwear for before or after a day on the trail.
DURABLE STRAP. Built for the lake, beach or backyard, these flip flops feature a Base Camp synthetic strap for durable wear wherever your little one adventures.
SUPERIOR SUPPORT. These sandals feature anatomical arch support for stability, while an extra-cushy, egg-crate-inspired EVA footbed offers ultimate comfort.
HIGH-TRACTION OUTSOLE. A lightweight rubber outsole provides great grip without the extra bulk, letting them roam comfortably and securely across any terrain.

TAKE ON THE DAY. An essential household staple, these sandals are a go-to classic for beach days, summer walks or just kicking back. They can pair it with their favorite shirts and shorts and proudly wear the badge of exploration with The North Face.
description: A durable, supportive kids' flip-flop sandal that's crafted with a comfortable footbed and rubber sole.
